headline: Beleaguered Offshore Wind Gets Two Small Signs of Hope
summary: The Department of Justice filed a legal brief earlier this month supporting Empire Wind, an offshore wind project near New York’s Long Island that the administration had previously halted.

headline: GE Aerospace (GE): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on GE Aerospace on Monopolistic Investor’s Substack by Antoni Nabzdyk. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on GE. GE Aerospace’s share was trading at $282.27 as of September 4th. GE’s trailing and forward P/E were 39.36 and 40.49 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. GE Aerospace (GE) emerged as […]

headline: GE Vernova Rides Electricity Boom as Cramer Endorses Stock and Price Target Climbs
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the 12 Jim Cramer Stock Picks this Week. Pointing to a Bull market in electricity, Jim Cramer gives a green signal to the stock purchase, and subsequently, the company’s target price rises. The second quarter earnings results reported on July 23, 2025, highlighted a revenue of $9.11 billion, […]

headline: GEV Stock Wins Deal to Repower German Wind Farm: Should You Invest Now?
summary: GE Vernova lands a German wind farm repowering deal as its shares soar 91% YTD, outpacing industry and S&P 500 growth.

headline: GE Vernova Expands Wind Power Footprint With New German Project
summary: GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) said Tuesday it will supply eight 6MW-164m turbines to Prokon Regenerative Energien eG to repower a wind farm in the Fleetmark community of Sachsen-Anhalt, Germany. The machines will be built at GE Vernova’s Salzbergen facility. The order was booked in the second quarter of 2025 and underscores the company’s “Workhorse Product Strategy” for onshore wind. Gilan Sabatier, chief commercial officer for GE Vernova’s onshore wind business, said repowering sites increases gen
